subject: Rich T 	Whats makes the front and back

All, looking at this tsuba, I was wondering about the front and back of 
it. There is no tell tale sign of design, it is for the most part even 
on both sides. There is no soft metal so the picture is not dominated on 
either side. There are no large Tagane on either side so it is hard to 
tell which side was mounted as face out.

Any clues in the design ?, as to which side is which ?.

I think it is the image on the right, by the
balance of the images design.

Rich

http://www.nihontomessageboard.com/tsuba_collection/shoami-bamboo.jpg
